name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Strategy Engineer with over 10 years of experience in the payments industry, specializing in the design and delivery of backend systems for financial platforms. Proficient in data analysis and performance tracking, leveraging strong skills in **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask) and **SQL** to develop high-performing APIs and scalable services. Expertise in project management and collaboration, ensuring successful execution of impactful projects. Hands-on experience with cloud platforms such as **AWS** and **Azure**, and a robust foundation in merchant acquiring, delivering innovative solutions that drive business success.
